data.title: multiply letters
data.statement:
Multiply the number of consonants with the number of vowels in the string.
Consonants: {{bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxz}} and uppercase equivalents
Vowels: {{aeiouy}} and uppercase equivalents
Letters with accents and special characters are ignored.

testCases.title: Verlaine
testCases.testIn:
6
Les sanglots longs
Des violons
De l’automne
Blessent mon coeur
D’une langueur
Monotone.

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
6
Ls snglts lngs
Ds vlns
D l’tmn
Blssnt mn cr
D’n lngr
Mntn.

testCases.testIn:

voici bien un texte sans accent ni ponctuation qui utilise des mots simples pour familiariser les enfants avec les touches de leur clavier point la plupart de ces eleves parviendront a finir ce test en plus de cinq minutes point cependant pour les meilleurs virgule

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read text:string(1024)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of lines of the character string
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> A string [[text]]
data.outputDescription: An integer for the multiplication result

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Multiply the number of consonants with the number of vowels in the string.
Consonants: bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxz and uppercase equivalents
Vowels: aeiouy and uppercase equivalents
Letters with accents and special characters are ignored.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of lines of the character string
Next N lines: A string text
Output
An integer for the multiplication result
Constraints
Example
Input
1
Toto
Output
4
